movie_title: What's new with DanTDM? | Real English For Gamers
introduction: In this video, we catch up with DanTDM to see what has been going on behind closed doors! You won't
lead_intro: Join us in discovering more about the famous video gamer, Dan TDM, as he introduces video games to his two-year-old son in this exciting YouTube video!

quiz.question: What are some of Asher's favorite things that Dan considered when choosing games for him?
quiz.explanation: Dan considered Asher's interests in cars, diggers, food, and animals when choosing games for him.

quiz.question: What is the name of the virtual chihuahua puppy they look after on the switch?
quiz.explanation: The virtual chihuahua puppy they look after on the switch is named Taito.

quiz.question: What did Dan feed Taito the virtual chihuahua puppy in the game?
quiz.explanation: Dan fed Taito the virtual chihuahua puppy cow food in the game.

quiz.question: What was the name of Dan's second child, born in November 2022?
quiz.explanation: Dan's second child, born in November 2022, is named Miles.

quiz.question: Why did Dan and his family decide to keep the faces of their children private?
quiz.explanation: Dan and his family decided to keep the faces of their children private out of privacy concerns and to maintain a level of privacy for their family.
